description: Deletes a state machine. This is an asynchronous operation. It sets the state machine's status to DELETING and begins the deletion process. A state machine is deleted only when all its executions are completed. On the next state transition, the state machine's executions are terminated. A qualified state machine ARN can either refer to a Distributed Map state defined within a state machine, a version ARN, or an alias ARN. The following are some examples of qualified and unqualified state machine ARNs: This API action also deletes all versions and aliases associated with a state machine.

parameters.name: stateMachineArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the state machine to delete.
